RandomNumber.description: Generates a random number between two numbers.

RandomInt.description: Generates a random integer between two integers.

SeededRandomInt.description: Generates a random integer between two integers. A seed number can be specified.

ValueOrDefault.description: Returns the given value, or a default if it is undefined.

CopyObjectProperties.description: Copies one object properties to another object.

Assert.description: Shows up an alert with the given message if the condition is false.

BubbleSort.description: Sorts an array with bubble sort.

AsyncRunTask.description: Calls a function multiple times asynchronously. If the environment is not specified, it will run synchronously.

IsWebGLEnabled.description: Returns if WebGL is enabled in the browser.

IsFileApiEnabled.description: Returns if file api is enabled in the browser.

Result.description: Returns the time between start and stop.

FPSCounter.description: Utility class for FPS count. It calculates the frames and returns FPS count for the last interval with the given length. The Get function should called in every frame.

Get.description: Returns the FPS count for the last interval with the given length.

parameters: callback functions for calls (onStart, onProcess, onFinish)

OnStart.description: Calls the onStart callback of the environment.

OnProcess.description: Calls the onProcess callback of the environment.

OnFinish.description: Calls the onFinish callback of the environment.

IsZero.description: Determines if the given value is near zero. Uses epsilon for comparison.

IsPositive.description: Determines if the given value is positive. Uses epsilon for comparison.

IsNegative.description: Determines if the given value is negative. Uses epsilon for comparison.

IsLower.description: Determines if a value is lower than an other. Uses epsilon for comparison.

IsGreater.description: Determines if a value is greater than an other. Uses epsilon for comparison.

IsEqual.description: Determines if two values are equal. Uses epsilon for comparison.

IsEqualWithEps.description: Determines if two values are equal. Uses the given epsilon for comparison.

IsLowerOrEqual.description: Determines if a value is lower or equal to an other. Uses epsilon for comparison.

IsGreaterOrEqual.description: Determines if a value is greater or equal to an other. Uses epsilon for comparison.

Minimum.description: Returns the minimum of two values. Uses epsilon for comparison.

Maximum.description: Returns the maximum of two values. Uses epsilon for comparison.

CoordFromArray2D.description: Returns a coordinate from an array of components.

CoordToArray2D.description: Returns array of components from a coordinate.

CoordFromArray.description: Returns a coordinate from an array of components.

CoordToArray.description: Returns array of components from a coordinate.

VectorDot.description: Calculates the dot product of two vectors.

VectorCross.description: Calculates the cross product of two vectors.

MatrixDeterminant2x2.description: Calculates the determinant of a 2x2 matrix.

MatrixDeterminant3x3.description: Calculates the determinant of a 3x3 matrix.

MatrixDeterminant4x4.description: Calculates the determinant of a 4x4 matrix.

MidCoord2D.description: Calculates the coordinate in the middle of two coordinates.

CoordOrientation2D.description: Calculates the turn type of three coordinates.

PolarToCartesian.description: Converts a polar coordinate to a cartesian coordinate.

GetArcLengthFromAngle.description: Calculates arc length from radius and angle.

MidCoord.description: Calculates the coordinate in the middle of two coordinates.

CoordSignedDistance.description: Calculates the distance of two coordinates along a direction vector.

GetVectorsFullAngle.description: Calculates the full angle (0 to pi) of two vectors with the given normal vector.

CoordOrientation.description: Calculates the turn type of three coordinates.

SphericalToCartesian.description: Converts a spherical coordinate to a cartesian coordinate.

CylindricalToCartesian.description: Converts a cylindrical coordinate to a cartesian coordinate.

GetArcLength.description: Calculates arc length between two vectors.

GetFullArcLength.description: Calculates arc length between two vectors with the given normal vector.

CalculateCentroid.description: Calculates center points of the given coordinates.

CalculateTriangleNormal.description: Calculates normal vector for the given triangle vertices.
parameters: the first vertex of the triangle
the second vertex of the triangle
the third vertex of the triangle

CalculateNormal.description: Calculates normal vector for the given coordinates.

BarycentricInterpolation.description: Calculates barycentric interpolation for the given values.

MatrixVectorMultiply.description: Multiplies a matrix with a vector.

MatrixDeterminant.description: Calculates the determinant of a matrix.

MatrixRotation.description: Creates a rotation matrix around the given axis.

MatrixRotationQuaternion.description: Creates a rotation matrix from a given quaternion.

MatrixRotationX.description: Creates a rotation matrix around the x axis.

MatrixRotationY.description: Creates a rotation matrix around the y axis.

MatrixRotationZ.description: Creates a rotation matrix around the z axis.

ApplyTransformation.description: Applies a matrix transformation to a coordinate.

GetSectorSegmentation.description: Returns the segmented coordinates of a sector.

BoxUnion.description: Calculates the union of two 3D boxes.

RotationXTransformation.description: Generates a rotation transformation around the x axis.

RotationYTransformation.description: Generates a rotation transformation around the y axis.

RotationZTransformation.description: Generates a rotation transformation around the z axis.

RotationXYZTransformation.description: Generates a rotation transformation around all axis in x, y, z order.
parameters: the x angle of the rotation
the y angle of the rotation
the z angle of the rotation

GetPlaneFromCoordAndDirection.description: Generates a plane from a coordinate and a direction.

GetPlaneFromThreeCoords.description: Generates a plane from three coordinates.

CoordPlaneSignedDirectionalDistance.description: Calculates the signed distance of a coordinate and a plane along a direction vector.

CoordPlaneDirectionalDistance.description: Calculates the distance of a coordinate and a plane along a direction vector.

Project.description: Projects a 3D coordinate to a 2D image.
parameters: the up vector of the camera
aspect ratio of the desired image

ConvexHull2D.description: Calculates the 2D convex hull from the given coordinates.
returns: coordinate array of the convex hull

ConvexHull3D.description: Calculates the 3D convex hull from the given coordinates. The result defines convex hull triangles as an array of arrays with three coordinates.

CreatePolygonFromVertices.description: Creates a cloned polygon from the given vertices.

PolygonSignedArea2D.description: Calculates the signed area of a polygon. The result is positive if the polygon has counter clockwise orientation, negative if it has clockwise orientation.

PolygonArea2D.description: Calculates the area of a polygon.

PolygonOrientation2D.description: Calculates the orientation of a polygon.

ChangePolygonOrientation2D.description: Reverses the orientation of a polygon.

CreateCCWPolygonFromVertices.description: Creates a cloned polygon from the given vertices with couter clockwise orientation.

PolygonComplexity2D.description: Calculates the complexity of a polygon.

CoordPolygonPosition2D.description: Calculates the position of a coordinate and a polygon.

SectorIntersectsPolygon2D.description: Determines if a sector intersects a polygon. The sides next to the starting and ending vertices will be skipped. To avoid this, give -1 for these values.

IsPolygonVertexVisible2D.description: Determines if a polygons vertex is visible from an another vertex. It means that the sector between the vertices does not intersects any side of the polygon and the sector lies fully inside the polygon.

CreatePolygonWithHole2D.description: Creates a simple polygon from multiple contours by creating in-out edges between contours. The input array should contain null values at contour ends.
parameters: array of contour vertices with null values at contour ends

PolygonTriangulate2D.description: Triangulates a polygon. The result defines triangles as an array of arrays with three original vertex indices.

CheckTriangulation2D.description: Checks a triangulation created with PolygonTriangulate2D. It checks if the area of triangles equal to the area of the original polygon.

CreatePolygonWithHole.description: Creates a simple polygon from multiple contours by creating in-out edges between contours. The input array should contain null values at contour ends.
parameters: array of contour vertices with null values at contour ends

PolygonTriangulate.description: Triangulates a polygon. The result defines triangles as an array of arrays with three original vertex indices.

OffsetPolygonContour.description: Offsets all vertices of a polygon.

CutPolygonWithPlane.description: Cuts a polygon with a plane. The result array contains cutted polygons grouped by their position to the plane.
parameters: (out) polygons in front of the plane
(out) polygons at the back of the plane

TraverseOctreeNodes.description: Traverses the nodes of the tree, and calls the given callback when a node found. The return value of the callback determines if we need to continue traverse along that given node.

CreateOctreeChildNodes.description: Create child nodes for an octree node. It calls a callback function which should create a new node element for the octree.
parameters: the box of the original node

ClipPolygonWithBSPTree.description: Clips a polygon with a created BSP tree.
parameters: (out) polygons in front of the tree
(out) polygons at the back of the tree
(out) polygons on the tree looks front
(out) polygons on the tree looks back

TraverseBSPTreeForEyePosition.description: Traverses a BSP tree for a given eye position.

GetGaussianCParameter.description: Calculates the gaussian functions c parameter which can be used for the gaussian function to reach epsilon at a given value.
parameters: the a parameter of the function
the b parameter of the function
returns: the c parameter of the function

parameters: the a parameter of the function
the b parameter of the function
the c parameter of the function

GetRuledMesh.description: Generates ruled mesh coordinates and polygons between two coordinate array. The two arrays should have the same length. The result is a coordinate array and a polygon array which contains indices for vertices.

IsEqual.description: Returns if the coordinate is equal with the given one.

IsEqualWithEps.description: Returns if the coordinate is equal with the given one. Uses the given epsilon for comparison.

DistanceTo.description: Calculates the coordinate distance to the given one.

Length.description: Calculates the length of the coordinate vector.

MultiplyScalar.description: Multiplies the vector with a scalar.

SetLength.description: Sets the length of the coordinate vector.

ToString.description: Converts the coordinate values to string.
returns: the string representation of the coordinate

IsEqual.description: Returns if the coordinate is equal with the given one.

IsEqualWithEps.description: Returns if the coordinate is equal with the given one. Uses the given epsilon for comparison.

DistanceTo.description: Calculates the coordinate distance to the given one.

AngleTo.description: Calculates the coordinate vector angle to the given one.

IsCollinearWith.description: Calculates the coordinate vector is collinear with the given one.

Length.description: Calculates the length of the coordinate vector.

MultiplyScalar.description: Multiplies the vector with a scalar.

SetLength.description: Sets the length of the coordinate vector.

ToString.description: Converts the coordinate values to string.
returns: the string representation of the coordinate

ToCoord2D.description: Converts the coordinate to a 2D coordinate.

CoordSystemToDirectionVectors.description: Converts coordinate system vectors to origo relative direction vectors.

CoordSystemToAbsoluteCoords.description: Converts the coordinate system vectors to absolute coordinates.

CoordPosition.description: Calculates the position of the sector and the given coordinate.

SectorPosition.description: Calculates the position of the sector and the given sector.
parameters: (out) the intersection point if it exists

ProjectCoord.description: Calculates the projected coordinate of the given coordinate.

GetLength.description: Returns the length of the sector.

CoordPosition.description: Calculates the position of the sector and the given coordinate.

parameters: the start point of the line
the start point of the line

CoordPosition.description: Calculates the position of the line and the given coordinate.

parameters: the start point of the line
the start point of the line

CoordPosition.description: Calculates the position of the line and the given coordinate.

ProjectCoord.description: Calculates the projected coordinate of the given coordinate.

ClosestPoint.description: Calculates the closest points between the line and a given line.
parameters: (out) the closest point on the current line
(out) the closest point on the given line

LinePosition.description: Calculates the position of the line and the given line.
parameters: (out) the intersection point if it exists
the minimum position of the box
the maximum position of the box
the minimum position of the box
the maximum position of the box

GetCenter.description: Returns the center point of the box.

parameters: the minimum position of the box
the maximum position of the box
the minimum position of the box
the maximum position of the box

GetCenter.description: Returns the center point of the box.

GetSize.description: Returns the size of the box.

IsCoordInside.description: Determines if the given coordinate is inside the box.

GetCenter.description: Returns the center of the sphere.

GetRadius.description: Returns the radius of the sphere.

GetMatrix.description: Returns the matrix of the transformation.

Append.description: Adds a transformation to the matrix.

parameters: the a component of plane equation
the b component of plane equation
the c component of plane equation
the d component of plane equation
the a component of plane equation
the b component of plane equation
the c component of plane equation
the d component of plane equation

GetNormal.description: Calculates the normal vector of the plane.

CoordSignedDistance.description: Calculates the signed distance of a coordinate and the plane.

CoordDistance.description: Calculates the distance of a coordinate and the plane.

ProjectCoord.description: Projects a coordinate to the plane.

CoordPosition.description: Calculates the position of the plane and the given coordinate.

LinePosition.description: Calculates the position of the plane and the given line.
parameters: (out) the intersection point if it exists

LineIntersection.description: Calculates the intersection point of a line and a plane. The line should not be parallel to the plane.

AddVertex.description: Adds a vertex to the polygon.
parameters: the x coordinate of the vertex
the y coordinate of the vertex

GetVertex.description: Returns the vertex with the given index.

SetVertex.description: Modifies the coordinates of an existing vertex.
parameters: the x coordinate of the vertex
the y coordinate of the vertex

VertexCount.description: Returns the vertex count of the polygon.

ContourPolygon2D.description: Represents a 2D polygon with more contours.

AddVertex.description: Adds a vertex to a contour of the polygon.
parameters: the x coordinate of the vertex
the y coordinate of the vertex

VertexCount.description: Returns the vertex count of a contour of the polygon.

GetVertex.description: Returns the vertex of a contour with the given index.

SetVertex.description: Modifies the coordinates of an existing vertex of a contour.
parameters: the x coordinate of the vertex
the y coordinate of the vertex

AddContour.description: Adds new contour to the polygon.

ContourCount.description: Returns the contour count of the polygon.

GetContour.description: Returns the contour with the given index.

AddVertex.description: Adds a vertex to the polygon.
parameters: the x coordinate of the vertex
the y coordinate of the vertex
the z coordinate of the vertex

GetVertex.description: Returns the vertex with the given index.

SetVertex.description: Modifies the coordinates of an existing vertex.
parameters: the x coordinate of the vertex
the y coordinate of the vertex
the z coordinate of the vertex

VertexCount.description: Returns the vertex count of the polygon.

Octree.description: Defines an octree. The octree contains each coordinate only once.
parameters: maximum number of coordinates in a node

AddCoord.description: Adds a coordinate to the octree. The return value is the stored index of the coordinate. If the coordinate was already in the octree, it returns the existing index.
returns: the stored index of the coordinate

FindCoord.description: Finds a coordinate in the octree, and returns the stored index of it. The return value is -1 if the coordinate does not exist.
returns: the stored index of the coordinate

FindCoordInNode.description: Finds a coordinate in a node.
returns: the stored index of the coordinate

AddCoordToNode.description: Adds a coordinate to a node.
returns: the stored index of the coordinate

FindNodeForCoord.description: Finds a node for a coordinate.

TriangleOctree.description: Defines an octree which stores triangles. Every triangle is placed in the smallest possible node which contains all of its vertices.

AddTriangle.description: Adds a triangle to the octree.

AddTriangleToNode.description: Adds a coordinate to a node.

AddPolygon.description: Adds a polygon to the tree.

Traverse.description: Traverses the tree and calls a function on node found.

TraverseNode.description: Traverses a node and its children and calls a function on node found.

GetNodes.description: Returns the nodes as an array.

AddPolygonToNode.description: Adds a polygon to a node.

AddInsidePolygonsToNode.description: Adds inside polygons to a node.

AddOutsidePolygonsToNode.description: Adds outside polygons to a node.

parameters: the starting point of the ray
the length of the ray, null means infinite ray
the starting point of the ray
the length of the ray, null means infinite ray

GetOrigin.description: Returns the origin of the ray.

GetDirection.description: Returns the direction of the ray.

IsLengthReached.description: Returns if the given length is greater than the length of the ray. Always return false in case of infinite ray.

CoordSectorPosition2D.description: Position of a coordinate and a sector.
values: coordinate lies at the end of the sector
coordinate lies outside of the sector

CoordSectorPosition.description: Position of a coordinate and a sector.
values: coordinate lies at the end of the sector
coordinate lies outside of the sector

CoordLinePosition2D.description: Position of a coordinate and a line.
values: coordinate lies on the left side of the line
coordinate lies on the left side right the line

CoordLinePosition.description: Position of a coordinate and a line.
values: coordinate lies outside of the line

CoordPlanePosition.description: Position of a coordinate and a plane.
values: coordinate lies in front of of the plane
coordinate lies at the back of the plane

LinePlanePosition.description: Position of a line and a plane.
values: line is parallel to the plane

HexColorToRGBComponents.description: Converts hex color strings to RGB components.

HexColorToNormalizedRGBComponents.description: Converts hex color strings to normalized (between 0.0 and 1.0) RGB components.

HexColorToRGBColor.description: Converts hex color strings to RGB color.

RGBComponentsToHexColor.description: Converts RGB components to hex color.

GetPolyEdgeStartVertex.description: Returns the start vertex index of a polygon edge.

GetPolyEdgeEndVertex.description: Returns the end vertex index of a polygon edge.

GetAnotherPgonOfEdge.description: Returns the polygon index which is next to the current polygon along an edge.

CalculateBodyVertexToPolygon.description: Calculates an array which contains array of the connected polygon indices for all vertex indices in the body. The result is an array of array of polygon indices.

CalculateAdjacencyInfo.description: Calculates the adjacency info for a body.

IsSolidBody.description: Returns if a given body is solid. It means that every edges of the body has two polygon neighbours.

CheckSolidBody.description: Returns if a given body solid body is correct. It means that every edges of the body has two polygon neighbours, and there are no edge in the body which appears twice with the same direction.

TraversePgonsAlongEdges.description: Traverses polygons along edges. The given callback function called on every found polygon. The return value of the callback means if the traverse should continue along the edges of the current polygon.
parameters: the polygon index to start from

AddVertexToBody.description: Adds a vertex to an existing body.
parameters: the x coordinate of the vertex
the y coordinate of the vertex
the z coordinate of the vertex

AddPolygonToBody.description: Adds a polygon to an existing body.
parameters: array of vertex indices stored in the body

CalculateBodyPolygonNormal.description: Calculates a normal vector for a polygon stored in the body.

CalculateBodyPolygonNormals.description: Calculates polygon normal vectors for all polygons stored in the body.

CalculateBodyVertexNormals.description: Calculates vertex normal vectors for all vertices stored in the body. The result is an array of array with vertex normal vectors.

MakeBodyInsideOut.description: Reverses all polygons orientation in the body.

SoftMoveBodyVertex.description: Moves a vertex and its nearby vertices depending on gaussian function.

CalculatePolygonCentroid.description: Calculates the centroid of a polygon stored in the body.

TriangulateWithCentroids.description: Triangulates all polygons of the body by connecting all polygon vertices with the centroid vertex of the polygon.
Triangulates all polygons of the body.

GenerateRandomMaterials.description: Generates random materials for a body. A seed number can be specified.

AddBodyToBSPTree.description: Adds a body to a BSP tree.

MergeCoplanarPolygons.description: Merges the coplanar polygons of a body.

CalculatePlanarTextureCoord.description: Calculates the planar texture coordinate for a coordinate.

CalculateCubicTextureCoord.description: Calculates the cubic texture coordinate for a coordinate.

CalculateCylindricalTextureCoord.description: Calculates the cylindrical texture coordinate for a coordinate.

CalculatePolygonPlanarTextureCoords.description: Calculates the planar texture coordinates for a polygon.

CalculatePolygonCubicTextureCoords.description: Calculates the cubic texture coordinates for a polygon.

CalculatePolygonCylindricalTextureCoords.description: Calculates the cylindrical texture coordinates for a polygon.

CalculateBodyPlanarTextureCoords.description: Calculates the planar texture coordinates for a body.

CalculateBodyCubicTextureCoords.description: Calculates the cubic texture coordinates for a body.

CalculateBodyCylindricalTextureCoords.description: Calculates the cylindrical texture coordinates for a body.

CalculateBodyTextureCoords.description: Calculates the texture coordinates for a body. The result is an array of arrays of texture coordinates.

CutBodyByPlane.description: Cuts a body by a plane.

GenerateCuboidSides.description: Generates the specified sides of a cuboid. The last parameter is a boolean array which defines sides visibility.

parameters: the segmentation of the top and bottom polygons
the segmentation of the top and bottom polygons
the top radius of the cone
the bottom radius of the cone
the segmentation of the top and bottom polygons

GeneratePrism.description: Generates a prism defined by a polygon. The base polygon is an array of coordinates which will be offseted in the given direction.

GenerateCurvedPrism.description: Same as GeneratePrism, but curve groups can be defined for all sides.

GeneratePrismWithHole.description: Generates a prism defined by a polygon. The polygon can contain null values which defines the end of the current contour. The holes have to be in reversed orientation than the main contour.
parameters: the base polygon which can contain null values

GenerateCurvedPrismWithHole.description: Same as GeneratePrismWithHole, but curve groups can be defined for all sides.
parameters: the base polygon which can contain null values

GeneratePrismShell.description: Generates a prism with the given width of sides.
parameters: the width of the prism sides

GenerateCylinderShell.description: Generates a cylinder with the given width of sides.
parameters: the width of the cylinder sides
the segmentation of the top and bottom polygons

GenerateLineShell.description: Generates a polyline with width and height.

parameters: the outer radius of the torus
the inner radius of the torus
the outer segmentation of the torus
the inner segmentation of the torus

GeneratePolyTorus.description: Generates a torus with a polygon cross section.
parameters: the cross section polygon of the torus
the outer radius of the torus
the outer segmentation of the torus

GenerateRuledFromSectors.description: Generates a ruled surface between two sectors.

GenerateRuledFromSectorsWithHeight.description: Generates a ruled surface with height between two sectors.

GenerateRuledFromCoords.description: Generates a ruled surface between two coordinate arrays. The two arrays should have the same length.

GenerateRevolved.description: Generates a revolved surface by rotating a polyline around a given axis. If the angle is 360 degree, it can generate top and bottom polygons.

GenerateTube.description: Generates a tube from a given array of polygons. All of the polygons should have same number of vertices.

GenerateFunctionSurface.description: Generates the surface of a given function.
parameters: the callback function for get surface point

GenerateFunctionSurfaceSolid.description: Generates the surface of a given function with a solid body.
parameters: the callback function for get surface point
the bottom z coordinate of the solid

ExplodeBodyToTriangles.description: Explodes a body to triangles. The function calls callback functions on geometry start and end, and when a triangle is created.
parameters: the parameters and callback functions of explode

ExportBodyContentToStl.description: Exports a body content to stl.
parameters: the body has only convex polygons
the body has only convex polygons
the model has only convex polygons

ExportBodyContentToObj.description: Exports a body content to obj.

ExportMaterialsToGdl.description: Exports a material container to gdl.

ExportBodyGeometryToGdl.description: Exports a body geometry to gdl.

AddVertexToBody.description: Adds a vertex to an existing body.

ConvertBodyToTriangleBody.description: Converts a body to triangle body.

ConvertModelToTriangleModel.description: Converts a model to triangle model.

ConvertTriangleModelToJsonData.description: Converts a triangle model to json data.

RayTriangleIntersection.description: Calculates intersection between a ray and a triangle.
returns: the result data (position, distance) if intersection found, null otherwise

RayBoxIntersection.description: Calculates intersection between a ray and a box.
parameters: the minimum and maximum points of the box
returns: the result data (position, distance) if intersection found, null otherwise

RayOctreeIntersection.description: Calculates the nearest intersection between a ray and an octree.
returns: true if found intersection, false otherwise

RayTriangleBodyIntersection.description: Calculates the nearest intersection between a ray and a triangle body.
returns: true if found intersection, false otherwise

RayTriangleModelIntersection.description: Calculates the nearest intersection between a ray and a triangle model.
parameters: the result data (position, distance, triangleIndex, bodyIndex)
returns: true if found intersection, false otherwise

RayTriangleModelIntersectionWithOctree.description: Calculates the nearest intersection between a ray and a triangle model. Caches the octrees for all bodies in the model.
parameters: the result data (position, distance, triangleIndex, bodyIndex)
returns: true if found intersection, false otherwise

BodyVertex.description: Represents a vertex of a 3D body. The vertex contains only its position as a 3D coordinate.

GetPosition.description: Returns the position of the vertex.

SetPosition.description: Sets the position of the vertex.

BodyPolygon.description: Represents a polygon of a 3D body. The polygon contains vertex indices of vertices stored in its 3D body, material indices of materials defined outside of the body, and a curve group index which defines its normal vector calculation in case of smooth surfaces.
parameters: array of vertex indices stored in the body

AddVertexIndex.description: Adds a vertex index to the polygon.

GetVertexIndex.description: Returns the body vertex index at the given polygon vertex index.

GetVertexIndices.description: Returns an array of the body vertex indices in the polygon.

SetVertexIndices.description: Sets the vertex indices in the polygon.

VertexIndexCount.description: Returns the vertex count of the polygon.

HasMaterialIndex.description: Returns if the polygon has a material index.

HasCurveGroup.description: Returns if the polygon has a curve group index.

GetCurveGroup.description: Returns the polygons curve group index.

SetCurveGroup.description: Sets the polygons curve group index.

InheritAttributes.description: Inherits attributes (material and curve group index) from an another polygon.

Body.description: Represents a 3D body. The body contains vertices, polygons, and a texture coordinate system.

AddVertex.description: Adds a vertex to the body.
returns: the index of the newly added vertex

AddPolygon.description: Adds a polygon to the body.
returns: the index of the newly added polygon

GetVertex.description: Returns the vertex at the given index.

GetVertexPosition.description: Returns the position of the vertex at the given index.

SetVertexPosition.description: Sets the position of the vertex at the given index.

VertexCount.description: Returns the vertex count of the body.

GetPolygon.description: Returns the polygon at the given index.

PolygonCount.description: Returns the polygon count of the body.

SetPolygonsMaterialIndex.description: Sets the material index for all polygons in the body.

SetPolygonsCurveGroup.description: Sets the curve group index for all polygons in the body.

GetTextureProjectionType.description: Returns the texture projection type of the body.

SetTextureProjectionType.description: Sets the texture projection type of the body.

GetTextureProjectionCoords.description: Returns the texture projection coordinate system of the body.

SetTextureProjectionCoords.description: Sets the texture projection coordinate system of the body.
parameters: the new texture projection coordinate system

SetPlanarTextureProjection.description: Sets the texture projection to planar with the given parameters.
parameters: x direction (start point along other axis) of the projection
z direction (normal vector) of the projection

SetCubicTextureProjection.description: Sets the texture projection to cubic with the given parameters.
parameters: x direction (edge of the cube) of the projection
y direction (edge of the cube) of the projection
z direction (edge of the cube) of the projection

SetCylindricalTextureProjection.description: Sets the texture projection to cylindrical with the given parameters.
parameters: x direction (start point along perimeter) of the projection
z direction (normal vector) of the projection

GetBoundingBox.description: Returns the bounding box of the body.

GetCenter.description: Returns the center of the bounding box of the body.

GetBoundingSphere.description: Returns the bounding sphere of the body.

OffsetToOrigo.description: Offsets the body to the origo.

Merge.description: Merges an existing body to the body.

Model.description: Represents a 3D model. The model contains bodies.

AddBody.description: Adds a body to the model.
returns: the index of the newly added body

GetBody.description: Returns the stored body with the given index.

BodyCount.description: Returns the body count of the model.

VertexCount.description: Returns the vertex count of the model.

PolygonCount.description: Returns the polygon count of the model.

Light.description: Defines a directional light. The parameter structure can contain the following values: ambient, diffuse, specular, direction.

Material.description: Defines a material. The parameter structure can contain the following values: ambient, diffuse, specular, shininess, opacity, texture, textureWidth, textureHeight.

GetMaterial.description: Returns a material from the container.

AddMaterial.description: Adds a material to the container.
returns: the index of the newly added material

GetDefaultMaterial.description: Returns the default material from the container. It is always exists.

Count.description: Returns the material count of the container.

VertInfo.description: Contains adjacency information for a body vertex. Contains arrays with indices of connected edge and polygon info.

EdgeInfo.description: Contains adjacency information for a body edge. Contains indices of connected vertex and polygon info.

PolyEdgeInfo.description: Contains adjacency information for a body polygon edge. Contains an index of an existing edge, and a flag which defines its direction.

PgonInfo.description: Contains adjacency information for a body polygon. Contains arrays with indices of connected vertex and poly edge info.

AdjacencyInfo.description: Contains adjacency information for a body. Contains arrays with vertex, edge and polygon info.

TriangleBody.description: Represents a 3D body which contains only triangles.

SetName.description: Sets the name of the body.

GetName.description: Returns the name of the body.

AddVertex.description: Adds a vertex to the body.
returns: the index of the added vertex

GetVertex.description: Returns the vertex at the given index.

SetVertex.description: Sets the position of the vertex at the given index.
parameters: the new coordinates of the vertex

VertexCount.description: Returns the vertex count of the body.

AddNormal.description: Adds a normal vector to the body.
parameters: the coordinates of the normal vector
returns: the index of the added normal vector

GetNormal.description: Returns the normal vector at the given index.

GetTriangleNormal.description: Returns the normal vector of a triangle at the given position.
parameters: the position of the normal inside the triangle

NormalCount.description: Returns the normal vector count of the body.

AddUV.description: Adds a texture coordinate to the body.
parameters: the coordinates of the texture coordinate
returns: the index of the added texture coordinate

AddDefaultUV.description: Adds a default texture coordinate to the body. The default texture coordinate is stored only once.
returns: the index of the default texture coordinate

GetUV.description: Returns the texture coordinate at the given index.

UVCount.description: Returns the texture coordinate count of the body.

AddTriangle.description: Adds a triangle to the body.
parameters: the vertex indices of the triangle
the normal vector indices of the triangle
the texture coordinate indices of the triangle
the material index of the triangle
the curve group index of the triangle
returns: the index of the added triangle

GetTriangle.description: Returns the triangle at the given index.

TriangleCount.description: Returns the triangle count of the body.

GetBoundingBox.description: Returns the bounding box of the body.

GetCenter.description: Returns the center of the bounding box of the body.

GetBoundingSphere.description: Returns the bounding sphere of the body.

Finalize.description: Finalizes the body. This operation calculates normal vectors and fixes the body if some data is missing from it.

TriangleModel.description: Represents a 3D model which contains only triangles.

AddMaterial.description: Adds a material to the model.
returns: the index of the added material

GetMaterial.description: Returns the material at the given index.

AddDefaultMaterial.description: Adds a default material coordinate to the model. The default material is stored only once.
returns: the index of the default material

GetDefaultMaterialIndex.description: Adds a default material, and returns the index of it.

MaterialCount.description: Returns the material count of the model.

AddBody.description: Adds a body to the model.
returns: the index of the added body

AddBodyToIndex.description: Adds a body to the model to the given index.
returns: the index of the added body

GetBody.description: Returns the body at the given index.

VertexCount.description: Returns the vertex count of the model.

TriangleCount.description: Returns the triangle count of the model.

BodyCount.description: Returns the body count of the model.

FinalizeMaterials.description: Finalizes the materials in the model. This fill every not specified material parameter with default values.

FinalizeBodies.description: Finalizes all body in the model.

Finalize.description: Finalizes the model. It finalizes materials and bodies.

GenerateSolidWithRadius.description: Generates a special solid with the given radius.

AddCumulatedPolygonToBody.description: Adds polygons to a body by cumulating the original polygons vertex index array.
parameters: the vertices of the original polygon

GenerateConvexHullBody.description: Generates a convex hull body from the given coordinates.

OrderPolygons.description: Order body polygons from front to back depending on the eye position.

CatmullClarkSubdivisionOneIteration.description: Runs one iteration of Catmull-Clark subdivision on a body.

CatmullClarkSubdivision.description: Runs multiple iterations of Catmull-Clark subdivision on a body.

SvgToModel.description: Converts an svg objects rect, path and polygon elements to a body.
parameters: the height of the result body
the maximum length of curved segments

BooleanOperation.description: Makes a boolean operation on the given bodies.

BernsteinPolynomial.description: Calculates the value of the Bernstein polynomial.

GenerateBezierCurve.description: Generates a bezier curve from the given points.
parameters: the segmentation of the result curve
the from-to range on x axis
the from-to range on y axis
the segmentation along the x axis
the segmentation along the y axis
callback function which returns the point for a position
user data which will be passed to getPointCallback

GenerateBezierSurface.description: Generates a bezier surface base on the given control points.
parameters: the segmentation along the x axis
the segmentation along the y axis

LegoDimensions.description: Class that contains lego brick dimensions.

CanvasDrawer.description: Represents an object which can draw primitives to a canvas.

GetWidth.description: Returns the width of the target.

GetHeight.description: Returns the height of the target.

DrawLine.description: Draws a line to the target.

DrawPolygon.description: Draws a polygon to the target.

SVGDrawer.description: Represents an object which can draw primitives to an svg.

GetWidth.description: Returns the width of the target.

GetHeight.description: Returns the height of the target.

DrawLine.description: Draws a line to the target.

DrawPolygon.description: Draws a polygon to the target.

SurfaceControlPoints.description: Represents control points for surface generation.
